title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results are not being selected in external jar when performing a search for references to the field. This issue is observed in Build 200201151.
OB:
1. JDK1.3.1 should be set as the default JRE.
2. Ensure that you have the source file (rt.jar) available.
3. Open java.io.File.
4. Search for references to the field 'tmpFir'.
SR: Make sure that JDK1.3.1 is set as the default JRE and that the source file (rt.jar) is available. Then, open java.io.File and perform a search for references to the field 'tmpFir'.
